stemmer.rslp

Class RSLPStrippingRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • stemmer.rslp.RSLPStrippingRule

  • public final class RSLPStrippingRule
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a rule of the RSLP algorithm and one example of a word and its result after the rule is applied. The rules was extracted from the appendix of 'A Stemming Algorithm for the Portuguese Language'
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Wadson Ferreira

      Store a RSLP rule

    • Constructor Detail

      • RSLPStrippingRule

        public RSLPStrippingRule(java.lang.String suffix,
                         int stemSize,
                         java.lang.String replacement,
                         java.lang.String[] exceptions,
                         java.lang.String example,
                         java.lang.String exampleResult)
        Store a RSLP rule
        Parameters:
        suffix - Suffix to be matched
        stemSize - The minimum size of the residual word after the suffix removing
        replacement - A string to be attached in the residual word after the suffix removing
        exceptions - List of word that can not be processed by the rule. Use the lists of RSLPException
        example - Example of word that can be processed by the rule
        exampleResult - Residual word for the word stored in the 'example'
